channel.title: Read herif you have made a server. Im stuck in the making :-0 Oh - Please
channel.description:
Ok if you would look at my signature....
I downloaded that.
Now do i need WinRar and i extract files or something? What's my next step after downloading that to make a server?
THIS IS WHAT I THINK
1.) I download that thing 2.) I download WinRar 3.) I Go to No-ip.com or wat ever it called.
IS THIS RIGHT?[color=red] Thanks

item.title: Read herif you have made a server. Im stuck in the making :-0 Oh - Please
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

[quote=“Uniqaz, post:2, topic:48601”]1) download
2) extract
3) go into the server dir and run the runserver.bat (some servers might have start.bat, run.bat and so on)
4) you can go playing now! :)[/quote]

another spam ? dude atleast put links how is he supposed to know wath he need to download !

ok first of all get a server source !

like non-pk
get testscape
(http://www.megaupload.com/nl/?d=DPTI7970)

pk
get pimpscape

(i dunno and idc check search)

now
download winrar and the link of testscape download that to
make a new map
and extract with winrar all filles in it , now you will see alot of things
but only 2 black icons like runserver.bat and compile.bat
now press run and it should say
starting testscape server on: 0.0.0.1:43594
or so
now
open moparscape
ip ; 127.0.0.1 (home ip )

now log in and you are in game
now to let other ppl in you will need to do portforwarding
and no-ip

portfowarding do search and same for no-ip , their are pic guide that explain beter then me ;p

lol

[br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2007, 10:29:57 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Uniqaz, post:4, topic:48601”]if you got a good pc and enough will to keep server alive, also some java knowledge then making it playable wouldn’t be hard tho, after you run the runserver.bat you can go to play ( www.whatismyip.com if you don’t know your ip already), then you go advertise your server and its playable (sorry if i misunderstood you )[/quote]

wathismyip , are you noob ? dude another guy that doens’t know wath he is saying , * thinking get youre post on a fair way* now you won’t get any further , you will need to open , ms-dos adn type : ipconfig
should give you something like this now

Microsoft Windows XP [versie 5.1.2600]
© Copyright 1985-2001 Microsoft Corp.

C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator>ipconfig

Windows IP-configuratie

Ethernet-adapter LAN-verbinding:

    Status van medium . . . . . . . . : medium ontkoppeld

Ethernet-adapter Draadloze netwerkverbinding 5:

    Verbindingsspec. DNS-achtervoegsel:
    IP-adres. . . . . . . . . . . . . : NUMBERS
    Subnetmasker. . . . . . . . . . . : NUMBERS
    Standaardgateway. . . . . . . . . : NUMBERS

C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator>

OK YOU JUST NEED

IP-adres. . . . . . . . . . . . . : NUMBERS

at those number , copy and paste them in internet explorer to go to youre home page of youre router !

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Uniqaz Uniqaz
item.description:
@Uniqaz wrote:

if you got a good pc and enough will to keep server alive, also some java knowledge then making it playable wouldn’t be hard tho, after you run the runserver.bat you can go to play ( www.whatismyip.com if you don’t know your ip already), then you go advertise your server and its playable (sorry if i misunderstood you )

item.dc:creator: @Uniqaz Uniqaz

@Uniqaz wrote:

  1. download
  2. extract
  3. go into the server dir and run the runserver.bat (some servers might have start.bat, run.bat and so on)
  4. you can go playing now!
